Entries.default: This skeleton stands rigid as stone and just as strong, eternally warding the crypt beyond.
This skeleton stands rigid as stone and just as strong, eternally warding the crypt beyond.
[Call out her name, the Lady of Vigils.]

The skeleton's shoulders are squared for battle. Its fingers grip the rusted remains of a large mace.

Above the skull, an eroded engraving on the wall depicts a kneeling woman raising a lantern.
The skeleton's shoulders are squared for battle. Its fingers grip the rusted remains of a large mace.
Your voice clangs through the caverns. It echoes, again and again, as the air around you grows heavy.

Empty eye sockets alight with flames. The skeleton shudders and rattles, head bowing forward. 

Its soul essence seeps into the door's seals.

"Faydwen." A toll, a death knell. "Faydwen, Lady of Vigils." 

A dark essence plumes up, coalescing into the air. Then it curls, sifting slowly into the skeleton's mouth.
